properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 11 at 7:46AM CST until January 11 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Fort Worth TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow. Accumulations of 1 to 3 inches will be possible
through 10 am.

* WHERE...Fannin and Collin Counties.

* WHEN...Until noon CST today.

* IMPACTS...Moderate to heavy snow may reduce visibility to less
than 1/2 mile and make roads slick. Any icing or snow
accumulations would melt by afternoon.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory means that periods of wintry weather
may cause travel difficulties. Expect slippery roads and limited
visibilities, and use caution while driving, especially on
elevated surfaces.

The latest road conditions for Texas can be found at
drivetexas.org.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY
